title: Yogurt Shop/Pizzeria
desc: Nathan gets buzz for a yogurt shop by creating a controversial flavor. He also devises a scheme for 8-minute pizza delivery.

title: Santa/Petting Zoo
desc: Nathan discovers the professional Santa he's helping has a dark secret and his attempt to market a petting zoo has unexpected results. Also, a teen is caught doing graffiti.

title: Clothing Store/Restaurant
desc: Nathan encourages a clothing store to allow shoplifting and trains a new assistant. A restaurant owner is surprised when Nathan asks to be included in her will.

title: Gas Station/Caricature Artist
desc: Nathan helps an independent gas station by devising the world's greatest rebate. He also attempts to make a fledgling caricature artist famous.

title: Haunted House/The Hunk
desc: Nathan tries to help a struggling haunted house. He also attempts to overcome his fear of the opposite sex by dating ten women at once.

title: Funeral Home/Burger Joint/Skydiving
desc: Nathan helps a struggling funeral home, a burger joint is forced to stand by its claim that it has the best burger in Los Angeles, and Nathan goes skydiving.

title: The Claw of Shame
desc: In this special episode, Nathan performs a daring escape in which he risks a fate that is truly worse than death, and failed business ideas from the season are showcased.

title: Private Investigator/Taxi Company
desc: Nathan puts a private investigator to the test by allowing himself to be spied on for a day, a taxi company is brought a solution for shy customers, and Nathan is forced to include product placement in his show.

title: Mechanic; Realtor
desc: Nathan convinces a mechanic to verify his estimates with a polygraph test, and rebrands a realtor to sell only ghost-free homes.

title: Souvenir Shop; ELAIFF
desc: Nathan's plan to help a Hollywood souvenir shop has surprising consequences.

title: Pet Store; Maid Service
desc: A pet store is given a new way to advertise; Nathan challenges a maid service to clean a house in six minutes.

title: Liquor Store; Exterminator; Car Wash
desc: Nathan helps a liquor store sell to underage customers; an exterminator learns how to work discretely.

title: Dumb Starbucks
desc: Nathan uses parody law to help a struggling coffee shop.

title: Dating Service; Party Planner
desc: Nathan helps a dating website attract female users; a party planner is given a new way to send out invites; Nathan also shares his strategy for self-motivation.

title: Taxi Service; Hot Dog Stand
desc: Nathan tries to get press for a taxi company; a hot dog stand implements Nathan's new customer service initiative.

title: Toy Company; Movie Theatre
desc: Nathan shows a toy company how to market to children; a movie theater instates a no-sharing policy at the concession stand; Nathan reconnects with an old friend.

title: Electronics Store
desc: Nathan faces off against a big corporation in an attempt to help a struggling electronics store.

title: Horseback Riding/Man Zone
desc: Nathan helps overweight people to be able to take horse riding lessons and also helps a Boutique business to increment their number of customers.

title: The Movement
desc: Nathan tries to get laborers to work for free at a moving company.

title: Sporting Goods Store/Antique Store
desc: Nathan attempts to secure an endorsement deal for a sporting-goods store, and an antique shop learns how to better utilize their "You break it, you buy it" policy.

title: Smokers Allowed
desc: Nathan helps a dive bar get around anti-smoking laws.

title: Hotel/Travel Agent
desc: A hotel tries to appeal to sexually active parents, a travel agent finds out how profit from her elderly customers, and Nathan shares his solution for never being late.

title: Nail Salon/Fun
desc: Nathan helps a nail salon overcome racial stereotypes while providing a service. Meanwhile, Nathan proves to the world, once and for all, that he is fun to hang out with.

title: The Hero
desc: Nathan tries to prove that there's a hero inside every one of us.

title: Nathan for You: A Celebration
desc: In a special episode hosted by Anthony Napoli, Nathan checks in with former guests of the show, including Brian Wolfe and the Ghost Realtor.

title: The Richards Tip
desc: Nathan helps a small-town diner with an act of extreme generosity.

title: Chili Shop / Massage Parlor
desc: Nathan helps a chili maker sell his chili at a closed event. Nathan promotes a massage parlor in an unusual way.

title: Andy vs. Uber
desc: Nathan teams up with a struggling taxi driver to take down Uber.

title: The Anecdote
desc: Nathan hones his storytelling skills.

title: Shipping Logistics Company
desc: Nathan teaches an international exporter how to ship smoke alarms tax-free.

title: Computer Repair / Psychic
desc: Nathan helps a computer repair shop earn the public's trust, and a psychic's marketing turns personal.

title: Finding Frances
desc: Nathan attempts to help a Bill Gates impersonator reunite with his long-lost love.
